tool_description: Analyzes return trends over time to identify patterns, seasonal variations, and anomalies in return behavior.

return_ids.description: List of return transaction IDs to analyze for trends

trend_period.description: Granularity for trend analysis: daily, weekly, monthly

smoothing_window.description: Moving average window size for trend smoothing (1-30)

detect_anomalies.description: Whether to detect anomalous return patterns

error_messages: Insufficient data for trend analysis: Minimum 10 return records required
Invalid trend period: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly]
Invalid smoothing window: Value must be between 1 and 30
Time span too short: Minimum 30-day period required for meaningful trend analysis
usage: Provide return_ids and trend_period to analyze return patterns over time. Adjust smoothing_window for trend clarity and enable detect_anomalies to identify unusual patterns.

trend_direction.description: Overall trend direction: increasing, decreasing, stable, volatile

anomaly_dates.description: Dates where anomalous return patterns were detected

trend_summary.description: Detailed summary of identified trends and patterns
